title: Patch 7.14
body: Login is fine but it doesnt show I have a summoner icon which should be the 2014 URF icon. When I try to play there are no champs in champ select so I get kicked, cant see mine and I cant see anybody elses summoner icons and or summoner spells and what not, the Darkstar thresh game mode worked but im assuming thats becuase you can only be thresh and the game just starts up...I have re downloaded the client and it didnt help..

replies.body: When you enter champ select, your client needs to sync up with the servers in order to figure out what champions you currently own so that it can display the right ones. If you aren't seeing any, then that's a pretty good sign that your network is having problems getting a solid link with us. Check up on your [**network settings**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) to make sure everything is still in order there!
